conclusion: The image shows a semi-circular wire frame with a radius of \\( r \\) connected to a direct current constant voltage power supply. Points \\( M \\) and \\( N \\) are connected to the terminals of the power supply. The wire frame is placed in a uniform magnetic field, with the plane of the wire frame perpendicular to the magnetic induction intensity.
The wire frame is in a uniform magnetic field, and the plane of the wire frame is perpendicular to the magnetic induction intensity.

The force on the straight part of the wire frame is given as \\( F \\). The semi-circular wire frame has a total length of \\( \pi r \\). The force on the entire wire frame is \\( F \times \frac{\pi r}{r} = \pi F \\).
